title: Tightrope
lyrics:
I spend my whole life walkin' on a tightrope
Won't drop the ball, oh oh oh oh
'Cause I wonder where it might go
Don't have it all, all all all all
Figured out what you're talking on the side for
I been walkin' on a tightrope

I spend my whole life walkin' on a tightrope

Won't drop the ball, oh oh oh oh

'Cause I wonder where it might go

Don't have it all, all all all all

Figured out what you're talking on the side for

I been walkin' on a tightrope



You know I'm gonna keep my balance

On myself, gotta grow, indigo, I'm magic

Can't fuck with someone who can let me forget

You know that I'm right, all the things that I said

You call me at night, I'm the only one left

Want me to say it's alright, he don't mess with your head

We're drunk off the Henn then we mess in your bed

Try to push me away then you pull me back in

Is this what you call love? I don't want none

Got to stay up, can't fall for none

What you call love, I don't want none

Got to stay up, can't fall off



I spend my whole life walkin' on a tightrope

Won't drop the ball, oh oh oh oh

'Cause I wonder where it might go

Don't have it all, all all all all

Figured out what you're talking on the side for

I been walkin' on a tightrope



I know it don't seem like

I found my peace, but I

Been walking more steady every second since I left

Steady pickin' up the piece I find at every step

And I'm only gonna get more

'Cause I'm doing what I'm supposed to

Planets told me that I'm special

And they told me that so are you

But you won't step up

So tell me how the stars gon' bless us

I walk with my chest up

Shoulders back, tight gut

Hahaha, hahaha

You pull me this way, push me that way

Girl I really hope you know I can't stay



I spend my whole life walkin' on a tightrope

Won't drop the ball, oh oh oh oh

'Cause I wonder where it might go

Don't have it all, all all all all

Figured out what you're talking on the side for

I been walkin' on a tightrope

I spend my whole life walkin' on a tightrope

Won't drop the ball, oh oh oh oh

'Cause I wonder where it might go

Don't have it all, all all all all

Figured out what you're talking on the side for

I been walkin' on a tightrope
